name: Dark says Goodnight
description:
The game is a 2D side scroller where, in a kind of dreamy world, you can fall into holes to different levels. 

Starting in the garage level, everything seems calm as you start to discover the familiarity of this underworld, given by the presence of the everyday items you saw in the garage.  When you start to explore, you see an incarnation of darkness coming for you.

You run and fall, and fall again, while darkness keeps chasing you.  At the end you find only darkness, and you can only hear some unknown sounds. When the light goes back on, you understand that you are at the garage where it all started, being able to make the journey all over again.

Don't let the darkness end you.

Created by team dig-dug during the FRAxARG 2020 Game Jam!
